Literature.Title: Rational design of HJH antimicrobial peptides to improve antimicrobial activity
Literature.Author: Wang Y, Zhu G, Wang W, Zhang Y, Zhu Y, Wang J, Geng M, Lu H, Chen Y, Zhou M, Chen J, Zhang F, Yang J, Cheng X

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:90% Hemolysis=2 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:90% Cytotoxicity=32 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:35% Cytotoxicity=2 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=0.75µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90029(MIC=3µg/ml)
